content: these patterns are free on my youtube channel however if you prefer the ad-free downloadable pdf version that can be purchased on my website https //www amenagerieofstitches com/products/crochet-pattern-12-days-of-mini-christmas-amigurumi-mystery-crochet-a-long-pdf-amigurumi-pattern the 12 days of mini christmas amigurumi i m combining my love of mini amigurumi and christmas to bring you a festive and fun mystery crochet-a-long each day from december 13th to december 24th a new mini amigurumi will be released these will be free video tutorials that you can watch over on my youtube channel these minis are small enough that they re the perfect size to make into ornaments just add a string or hook to them and they re ready to hang on your tree each mini takes only a couple of hours to complete which makes these the perfect project to work on during this cozy season these patterns are great for all skill levels and even if you re a beginner you can make these crochet pattern difficulty beginner to intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed weight 1 or super fine weight yarn i m using hobbii friends cotton 8/4 in the colors emerald 105 chestnut 11 rainbow cotton 8/4 in the color sunny yellow 55 size b/2 25mm crochet hook 6mm safety eyes black embroidery floss and needle polyester fiberfill stuffing yarn needle scissors 3 stitch markers skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain slip_stitch working in back loops and front loop only half_double_crochet double_crochet finished measurement tree measures 2 5 inches tall and 1 5 inches wide please note- the finished size will vary depending on what type of yarn and size hook you decide to use as well as how you decide to finish it
